body_html: Easiest is building from 0.3.X source with cudnn 7.0, if you do need 7.1 (why?) then you have to fix the 0.3.1 yourself by applying a fix similar to https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/pull/5439/files. You can't apply #5439 directly because in 0.3.x cudnn rnn bindings were still in python, and they were moved to C++ for 0.4.
